_header: I Joseph wonder how this may be
Note: First and fifth lines to be repeated in singing, and written thus, st. 1.
_description: Joseph’s Trouble about Mary — four 5-line stanzas (aaaab) and four-line burden: ‘Meruele noght Josep on Mary mylde / Forsake hyr not tho she be with childe’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
I josep wonder how hit may beI josep wonder how hit may beThat
                    mary wex gret when Y and she…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Thy forefaderes of paynes to vnbyndeTherfor muse not this
                    mater in thy myndeMeruell not [Joseph]
